name: Dont Let The Red Cubes Touch!
name_original: Dont Let The Red Cubes Touch!
description:
Just a simple toy where you spawn physics cubes to stop the falling blocks from touching. This whole game is controlled by the mouse and clicking.

By the way there is no end to the game. This will come in a future update.

I'm trying to get feedback on if this would make a good free to play mobile app if I fleshed it out.
